name: Spicy Peppe: Special Edition
description:
Spicy Peppe is back and Upgraded with some new features! Join Spicy and Team Cyler to stop the powerful Virus Lord Dexos Hexagon from taking over the Universe and the Cyber-Verse. The fate of the Universe and Cyber-Verse all rests in Spicy and his friend's hands now!

  • Play as 10 different characters with their own abilities.
  • Unique Bosses to fight, as well as some Secret Bosses to test your limits
  • AUG-Star upgrade system! Enhance your gear to face deadlier enemies!
  • Use Cyber Magic to bend the digital elements to your will!
  • Use TechX Skills to boost yourself or weaken your foe!
  • Use UltraX Abilities to destroy everyone!
  • A few side quests and activities along the way!
  • A story waiting to be uncovered!
